body:
Comment 1: 
Reading the documentation, it seems that "parseable by itself" might mean that this is
correct behaviour.

However, it would be very useful to be able to do:

var pages = new(template.Set).Funcs(someFuncs).MustParseTemplateFiles("templates/*")

Maybe there should be a ParseFileInSet method on Template; then
ParseTemplateFiles could use it.
